overview: An Indian LGBTQIA+ themed short film that seeks to show a glimpse of the life of a young middle-aged guyâ€™s desire to find a same-sex companion in a city that continues to refuse public acceptance of alternate sexualities. Set in the busy streets of the megacity, Mumbai, the young protagonist ventures out in pursuit of love as he walks through the by-lanes and travels in the local trains till he reaches Marine Drive for a breath of fresh air. There, he meets an interesting looking guy he feels attracted to; the both of them have a small exchange of conversations and instantly become friends.
title: Khwaaish
